title: American cornbread and sausage stuffing
ingredients: ['680g pork and sage sausage meat', '4 onions, chopped', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '530g crumbled cornbread', '210g cubed soft white bread', '230ml chicken stock', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '2 teaspoons poultry seasoning', '1 teaspoon steak sauce', '1 tablespoon salt']
